text: O11CE (pronounced in Spanish as Once, also known as Disney 11 in the English and Dutch dubs) is an Argentine teen television series that premiered on 13 March 2017 on Disney XD Latin America. Produced by Disney Channel Latin America in collaboration with Disney Channel Europe and produced in Argentina by Pegsa Group with Pol-ka services. It stars Mariano González as Gabo and Sebastián Athié as Lorenzo. In the UK, Ireland, and the Netherlands, the series is known as Disney 11. == Plot == The series revolves around Gabo, a soccer-loving teenager who, upon receiving a scholarship from the prestigious Sports Academic Institute (IAD) of Buenos Aires, will see his dream of playing at The Golden Hawks, the renowned amateur team of the school, and also his longing to become a professional footballer. == Cast == * Mariano Guerineau González as Gabriel 'Gabo' Moretti * Sebastián Athié as Lorenzo Guevara (†)Notice of death of Sebastián Athié, today.com; accessed 9 July 2020. * Juan David Penagos as Ricardo 'Ricky' Flores * Luan Brum as André 'Dedé' Duarte * Paulina Vetrano as Zoe Velázquez * Daniel Patiño as Martín Mejía * Agustina Palma as Martina Markinson * Julia Dovganishina as Anna 'Anya' Safonova * Juan Baustista Herrera as Leonardo 'Leo' Palacios * Santiago Stieben as Vitto Voltaglio * Nicolás Pauls as Francisco Velázquez * Javier Eloy Bonanno as Joaquín Costa * Lucas Minuzzi as Pablo Espiga * Renato Quattordio as Apolodoro 'Catorce' Nikotatópulos * Federico J. Gurruchaga as Lucas Quintana * Mariano Zabalza as Camilo Montero * Tomás Blanco as Valentino Toledo * Fausto Bengoechea as Adrián Roca * Paulo Sánchez Lima as Mariano Galo * Juan Francisco Cabrera as Daniel Gratzia * Juan de Dios Ortíz as Diego Guevara * Verónica Pelaccini as Isabel Di Marco * Guido Pennelli as Ezequiel Correa * Candelaria Grau as Celeste Brizuela * Julián Cerati as Felipe Aragón * Luca Marconetti as Hans Newman == Series overview == == References == == External links == * Category:2017 Argentine television series debuts Category:2019 Argentine television series endings Category:Television series by Disney Category:Disney XD original programming Category:Disney Channels Worldwide original programming Category:Spanish-language Disney Channel original programming
title: Once (TV series)
